sentences.en: Maybe we should put a no-fly zone over the country?
sentences.cn: 也许我们该把带个英国设为禁飞区？

sentences.en: At the very least, we need a no-fly zone over Oyster Creek.
sentences.cn: 最起码，我们需要在奥伊斯特河上方设立禁飞区。

sentences.en: There are two primary types of no-fly zones imposed by air forces.
sentences.cn: 目前主要有两种由空中打击力量形成的禁飞区。
